marytts.signalproc.analysis.distance

Class BaselineLPSpectralEnvelopeDistortionComputer

  • java.lang.Object
    • marytts.signalproc.analysis.distance.BaselineDistortionComputer
      • marytts.signalproc.analysis.distance.BaselineLPSpectralEnvelopeDistortionComputer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CoshDistanceComputer, ItakuraSaitoDistanceComputer, KullbackLeiblerLPSpectralEnvelopeDistanceComputer, RmsLogLPSpectralEnvelopeDistortionComputer

    public class BaselineLPSpectralEnvelopeDistortionComputer
extends BaselineDistortionComputer
    Implements an LP spectral envelope based distortion measure
    Author:
    Oytun Türk
